overview:
Internationally recognized Data Bases expert with hands on experience in complex projects and consulting engagements. Sonali is a well known MySQL Consultant, Developer & Trainer.

Sonali is cofounder of OSSCube.

Sonali is Asiaâ€™s first Woman Certified MySQL DBA and Indiaâ€™s first MySQL authorized instructor. Sonali is instrumental in setting up clusters, optimizing performances of large portals and delivering MySQL training to several Fortune 500 companies.

Currently Sonali is authoring a book on MySQL Clusters.

Sonali actively promotes use of Open Source in businesses all over the world and have cofounded OSSCamp, a community focused on Open Source Knowledge sharing. Sonali also regularly interacts with technology students of various institutes. Sonali regularly speaks at International conferences, unconferences and meetup groups on various Open Source technology topics.

Her most recent speaking assignments have included OSSPAC, Singapore; OSI Days, India, International PHP Conference, Germany; National Open Source Conference, India.
